entities.name: resurrection stone
entities.description: The Resurrection Stone is mentioned as a powerful object that can bring back the dead. It is described as an army of Inferi to one person and the return of parents to another.

entities.name: cloak
entities.description: The Cloak is mentioned as a powerful object that can protect and shield others as well as its owner. It is said to be part of a trio with the Resurrection Stone and the wand.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: The wand is mentioned as a powerful object that would lead us to power.

relationships.description: The Resurrection Stone and the Cloak are part of a trio, with the legend saying that the man who united all three objects would be truly master of death.
The Resurrection Stone and the Wand are part of a trio, with the legend saying that the man who united all three objects would be truly master of death.
The Cloak and the Resurrection Stone are part of a trio, with the legend saying that the man who united all three objects would be truly master of death.
The Cloak and the Wand are part of a trio, with the legend saying that the man who united all three objects would be truly master of death.
The Resurrection Stone might be useful in hiding Ariana, according to one person's thought.
